string.value: You arrive on the island after traveling for a long time on #p1002101#'s ship... #p1013000# seems to feel something. Talk to #p1013000#.
#p1013000# says that he can feel a strange familiar feeling coming from deep within the island. He think that there may be another Onyx Dragon. Head toward the center of the Island.

There was a giant Dragon asleep inside a cave in the center of the island. But you could not enter due to a #o9300391# made with magic. How can you pass this wall? After thinking for awhile, you decide to return to #m104000000# for now.

Master! Master! Something's strange. I don't hear anything, not even birds chirping, squirrels running, or leaves rustling in the wind! Seriously, all I hear are the waves. I would think that such quiet would make me anxious, but I kind of feel rather relaxed.

There's something in the middle of the island, I can feel it. Something familiar, yet new! Maybe there's another dragon! Master, let's go check it out! I wonder if it's something related to Onyx Dragons!
It's no fun when your hands play butterfingers at a time like this. C'mon, master!
Wait. What's going on? I think that #o9300391# might be made of magic. Another being of my race...right at my fingertips. So close and yet so far!\r\n#L0##bPerhaps give it one more try?#l\n#k
No, I don't think it'll be any use. You don't want to do anything that might hurt a fellow dragon on the other side.

Doesn't look like you can get to the other side unless you break the #o9300391#. It doesn't look like it will break easily, either. Sigh, let's just keep training. Perhaps a clue will come to us eventually.
Yeah, let's get stronger and come back to this island later, master!
Hurry, master! Let's go to the #bcenter of the island#k!
